Articles.Content: Time to burst the bubble. It's old news: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/126658-Rescue-missions-Sending-me-to-Probe-cores](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/126658-Rescue-missions-Sending-me-to-Probe-cores)

Funny how there's a specific message about there being no hatch

Hmmmm... Illuminati plot confirmed. ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
Question. What does the IVA look like?
Have you tried collecting it and bringing the whole thing back to see if you get credit?
I must be missing something. How does a Kerbal get into a probe core???
Has anyone had this happen on an unmodded install?

> 
> Has anyone had this happen on an unmodded install?

Nope, but I haven't seen it happen before 1.0.4.

It's either because of a recent mod, or something caused by 1.0.4 but only happens rarely.

> 
> What's the IVA look like?

Ugh, I totally forgot to check that. Dont use IVA much anyway. But would be curious as well.

And yes, I returned him and finished the contract using the claw.

> 
> I must be missing something. How does a Kerbal get into a probe core???

Someone forgot to add a check for CrewCapacity > 0.
I'm laughing way too much at the thought of a Kerbal being squshed in one of those probes like "Hmpf. help! ;\_; "

> 
> I'm laughing way too much at the thought of a Kerbal being squshed in one of those probes like "Hmpf. help! ;\_; "

Maybe he was actually one of the technicians who was working on it in the assembly building, when someone got a bit too enthusiastic and launched it into space ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> Funny how there's a specific message about there being no hatch
> Hmmmm... Illuminati plot confirmed. ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

I assume it's just really good programming (everything modular and sanity checked for error proofing), or for when/if and pods are internal transfer only. Like space station parts where you can go in through a pod, but not out of the sciencebay/lab. Currently the science bay does have a hatch though.
V'Ger syndrome: Some advanced AI's won't accept programming updates, unless you're willing to Merge with them.
